mainEntity.name: Does Monster Upsells support Shopify Plus stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Monster Upsells is fully compatible with Shopify Plus, allowing advanced customization and large-scale store needs.

mainEntity.name: Can I track the performance of upsell offers?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, Monster Upsells provides an analytics dashboard that tracks the success of upsell campaigns, including conversion rates and revenue generated from upsell offers.

mainEntity.name: Is there customer support available for technical issues?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, contact support is available to assist merchants with setup, troubleshooting, and optimizing the app for their store.
